question.questionA: Fronds without auricles at the base, sagittate or cordate
question.questionB: Fronds with auricles at the base

question.questionA: Petiole and rachis densely covered in glandular hairs
question.questionB: Petiole and rachis not covered in glandular hairs

question.questionA: Underside of pinnules coated in reddish hairs
question.questionB: Underside of pinnules not coated in hairs

question.questionA: Petiole green, usually less than 2 cm
question.questionB: Petiole black, at least towards the base, usually more than 5 cm

question.questionA: Frond bright green, without a shiny adaxial surface; pinnae ovate
question.questionB: Frond dark green, with a shiny adaxial surface; pinnae lanceolate
